title: CREAMY CASHEW CITRUS SMOOTHIE
directions: Ripe bananas need to be frozen ahead of time. Peel, cut into 1/2" pieces and freeze until solid. Transfer to an air-tight storage container until ready to use. Can be done up to 1 month in advance.
Place all ingredients in the body of a blender in the order listed.
Process until smooth and creamy. Serve immediately topped with chopped cashews and an orange slice. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 medium Navel oranges, peeled and quartered
2 medium ripe bananas, sliced into 1/2" pieces and frozen
chopped cashews and orange slice for serving (optional)
